Model.ScoreBoard

Class YatzyScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.ScoreBoard.ScoreBoard
      • Model.ScoreBoard.YatzyScoreBoard

  • public class YatzyScoreBoard
extends ScoreBoard
    YatzyScoreBoard is an extension of a ScoreBoard, with additional methods related to the game Yahtzee. It's a personal scoreboard and therefore only has one column.
    Author:
    Isak, Gustav
